projects.name: Dashmesh Agriculture
projects.description: A comprehensive, production-ready website for Dashmesh Agriculture, showcasing premium agricultural equipment and machinery. This project demonstrates modern web development practices with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience.

projects.name: Vasu Interio
projects.description: Designed and developed a modern website for Vasu Interio, showcasing their expertise in home interiors, modular kitchens, wardrobes, sofa upholstery, curtains, and blinds.

projects.name: Indowel
projects.description: Created an online catalog for Indowel to present their wide range of hardware accessories,hinges, tower bolts, screws, handles, and  curtain fittings.

projects.name: Socially
projects.description: A modern social networking platform that enables users to connect, share content, and interact in real-time. Features include user profiles, post creation with media uploads, commenting, and a responsive interface for seamless mobile and desktop experiences.
